# Load packages

```{r}
#| echo: false
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(dplyr)
  library(ggplot2)
})
```

# Make plot

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x=flipper_len, y=bill_len, color=species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```

sessionInfo()
